data.name: Big Yeetus
data.detailed_description:
Story?!

There is a big party on top of the castle, but Big Yeetus is late! The entry has already closed, so they need to find another way up to join the party.

How To Play

You can walk, jump and rotate. The cam will follow your movement, but the 3rd person perspective doesn't make it easier sometimes. Avoid all the traps on the way up and master the difficult jumps, and use the few checkpoints to respawn if you die.

What to Expect

If you are very fast you can complete the full course in a few minutes. But getting this fast will take A LOT of practice, so you will die very often and you will have to restart from the bottom very often. The course is built so player skill and experience matters most, there are basically no RNG components in the game.

Traps

Some traps are very straight forward, but others are hidden and you have to be lucky to miss them on your first encounter:

Jumps

A few jumps look difficult but are easy to master and a lot of fun:


Other jumps look easy but are actually reall hard.

data.short_description: As a Unicorn you run through an obstacle course up a hill and to the top of the castle. Avoid traps and master the obstacles to join the party in the castle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: When the player dies it happens in a bloody explosion.
